item.description:
Please join myself for an afternoon of Candlepin Bowling fun at Lanes and Games. For information on costs, for shoes, bowling strings, etc.... Please view the websight at :Lanesandgames@verizon.net
There had been a BIG request for bowling with this group, however PLEASE only RSVP a yes if you are 90 percent sure you are going to attend. I did have 4 no shows at my last event and it wasn't too fair to others who wanted to attend.
I will have two lanes reserved. I hope for twelve attendees so we can have two equal teams of 6 people.
There is a lounge area, some billiards, and an arcade if members did want to hang out afterwards. Of Course as always, I will leave this optional.
Please meet me in the downstairs lobby area where we will get our shoes, etc....
Lastly, this particular event does not require clean up, however IF a future event does require clean up, I would appreciate some help before you depart. I personally was left with all the clean up at the last event.
Thanks again for your cooperation and I hope to see you on the 29th for my second event.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a balloon and a red meet up t shirt on. Please meet in lobby area

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Sunday Afternoon Bowling
